page.title: 13EDUCATION STOKE ON TERN
page.content:
{A DIARY OF OUR SCHOOL YEAR}
Here are six main events our school celebrates during the school year. {HARVEST We celebrate Harvest in September. It's when we say thank you to God for giving us food.The children bring all kinds of food in, like bread, soup and vegetables. The Vicar comes to take a special assembly.After the assembly the food is packed into parcels and the children take them to the old people in the Parish. { CHRISTMAS Jesus was born on Christmas Day. At school we have parties to celebrate His birth.It is a happy time. We play games and sing songs.Father Christmas comes and gives out presents to everyone. Also we have a Carol Service where we sing special songs to God.
